name: Bingo Online
description:
Start up Bingo Online and jump right into a game of Bingo with a global community of players.

Match your skill level by playing one to four cards at a time. Use power-ups to claim more Bingos and win bigger prizes. Play Bingo in Vegas, Paris, and other fun locations. Each theme has its own scratch-off ticket where you can win BIG BONUSES! Compete with other players from around the world on the global leaderboards. Easy to use controls and simple gameplay make Bingo Online fun for players of all ages.

Features:

• Play online with a global community of players
• Play 1, 2, 3, or 4 cards at a time
• Power-ups, prizes, and collectible items
• Fun themes including Vegas, Paris, Candy, and Halloween
• Earn BIG BONUSES by playing scratch-off tickets
